summary: The diff adds a migration that seeds an Editor-in-Chief editorial member and updates frontend role display logic to show the canonical "Editor-in-Chief" label when `isEditorInChief` is true. However, the backend seeding only occurs when the existing editorialMembers map is empty, and the migration introduces unrequested personal data (email/phone).

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the Editor-in-Chief record is added/persisted such that it is present regardless of existing editorial members (so it will be returned by `getAllEditorialMembers` and appear in the Editorial Board page and Admin Panel list).
missing_requirements.reason: The migration only inserts the new member when `old.editorialMembers.isEmpty()`. If the canister already has editorial members, the new record will not be added, so the entry may not appear in listing APIs/UI for existing deployments.

hallucinated_features.description: Added email and phone fields for Dr. Dinesh Kumar Singh.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states not to add email/phone/photo data for this member unless explicitly provided; the diff introduces both an email address and a phone number.
